stories.text: Which book made you understand what real mathematics was all about? Not rote calculations we do in school. Or in other words, which book got you curious to learn more of mathematics and make a career out of it??
stories.title: Ask HN: Which book made you study mathematics

stories.text: teenytools - An fast & easy to access design tool for web devs and designers
stories.title: Show HN: teenytools – a web design and development toolbox

stories.text:
I am from Ukraine.

If you know people from Russia, or you are in groups where are Russians please tell them that this is a war in Ukraine, ask people to go on the streets and protest. People in Russia simply don't know what is going on in Ukraine, they are misinformed and trust in their propaganda - which is complete lie. Nobody is waiting for Russians in Ukraine, people hate Russians and will never forgive and forget for what are they doing.
stories.title: Ask HN: Tell all people in Russia about war in Ukraine
Why the Chinese Internet Is Cheering Russia’s Invasion
Thousands of Russian tech workers sign petition opposing invasion of Ukraine
Why Russia is so concerned about Ukraine joining NATO
Covid Is More Like Smoking Than the Flu
